string-array.name: poster_content
string-array.item: Appropriate use of colors, space and graphics
The content is relevant to the theme
Easy to read, captured the idea/topic of the poster
Strongly represent the research question and contained important points Includes balanced summary of what was done and what was found
Research methods are very well designed and appropriate to research question. Appropriate statistical methods are applied.
Matches with research question/objective being asked
Poster has a logical, intuitive sequence of information. Important information is readily available and easy to grasp

string-array.name: presentation_content
string-array.item: Relevance and Significance of project (to field of study, community, etc.)
Background defines the importance of research
Methods showing rigor, are effectively planned and executed
Smooth transitions and Logical flow between slides/ sections
Main points supported with details and Documented facts where necessary
Comprehension and knowledge of subject area
Clear voice with good pace / command on language
Effective use of time / In time limit
